rumble.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make a series of long low sounds, especially a long distance away from you
rumble.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: We could hear thunder rumbling in the distance.
rumble.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to move slowly along while making a series of long low sounds
rumble.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: We watched the tanks rumbling past the window.
rumble.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if your stomach rumbles, it makes a noise, especially because you are hungry
rumble.translation[0].definitions[3].def: to find out what someone is secretly intending to do
rumble.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a series of long low sounds
rumble.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the low rumble of traffic in the distance
